thread.title: How Houston's bus system became a model for mass transit PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: How Houston's bus system became a model for mass transit | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: How Houston's bus system became a model for mass transit PBS NewsHour
text: This summer, Houston officials dramatically restructured the route of municipal busses to streamline service reflecting where people live and work -- all for almost no additional cost. Now, the system may be a possible model for how other cities redesign their public transportation. Special Correspondent Karla Murthy reports.
